overview.en: ASC（Adanos Chain）as a leader in e-commerce of blockchain ,Based on the powerful of Block chain underlying Technology, Via DPoC (Delegates Proof of Credit) and PoL(Proof of Labor) to construct of a decentralized BAAS（Blockchain as a Service） ecosystem.BAAS ecosystem is committed to building a trusted ecological entrance for the e-commerce industry. Constructing the Global decentralized E-commerce Ecosystem, Realize the interconnection of global EC nodes, Promoting the Development of Product traceability system,Provide value data services.It will become the next generation of e-commerce engine, Promoting the Reform of e-commerce Industry,To realize the new harmonious commercial ecology of resource sharing, co-governance and interconnection.
overview.zh: ASC (艾达链)是全球区块链电商BAAS生态系统开创者，艾达链创造性地通过 DPoC(Delegates Proof of Credit)信用权益证明共识机制和 PoL(Proof of Labor) 跨链共识机制，致力于构建去中心化BAAS（Blockchain as a Service）应用生态系统。 BAAS 生态系统致力于打造全行业、全产业链基于区块链电商的可信任生态底层入口。构建全球去中心化电商生态，实现全球电商节点互联，推动产品溯源体系的发展，提供价值数据服务。艾达链BAAS生态系统将成为下一代电商引擎，推动电商产业变革，实现资源共享、共治、共联的和谐商业新生态。
